locations.name: The Forgotten Cave Entrance
locations.description: A moss-covered stone archway leading into the darkness, the air thick with the scent of damp earth.

locations.name: The Echoing Hallway
locations.description: A narrow corridor with walls that seem to whisper, lit by flickering torch sconces.

locations.name: The Treasure Chamber
locations.description: A grand chamber filled with glittering gold and ancient artifacts, guarded by a formidable beast.

locations.name: The Trap-Filled Passage
locations.description: A hallway riddled with hidden traps and pressure plates, requiring careful navigation.

locations.name: The Hidden Sanctuary
locations.description: A concealed room with ancient murals and a serene atmosphere, untouched by time.
